synopsis.text: After the cursed light of Kazan descended upon the continent of Arad, hordes of demons emerged, and one man, Baron, found himself afflicted with a demonic left arm. In the year 981, Baron embarks on a daring quest to unravel the mystery behind the curse and restore his arm. Brandishing a mystical sword inhabited by the spirit Roxy, Baron encounters a motley crew of warriors, including the self-proclaimed 'Gunner of Love' Capensis, the formidable fist-fighter Ryunmei, and the mischievous young mage Ixia. Together, they form the 'Party' and navigate a treacherous world filled with underground fight clubs and axe-wielding demons. As Baron and his allies search for a cure, they must also endure the unpredictable antics of Ixia's magical exploits. Will they unlock the secret to lifting the curse and ensure their survival in this perilous realm? Join Baron and the 'Party' in their thrilling journey through a world forever changed by the sinister force of Kazan.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
